mapper.sql: paperId, questionId, questionSerialNum, answerContent, score, correctState, spare_1, spare_2, spare_3, spare_4
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from answer_info
order by ${orderByClause}

select answer_info.paperId as paperid,answer_info.questionId as questionid,question.questionskill as questionskill,question.title as title, question.answer as answer,question.questiontype as questiontype,question.analysis as analysis,question.difficultdegree as difficultdgree, answer_info.questionserialnum as questionserialnum,answer_info.answercontent as answercontent,answer_info.score as score, answer_info.correctstate as correctstate,question.options as options
from question,answer_info where question.questionId=answer_info.questionId and answer_info.paperId = #{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by answer_info.questionSerialNum asc

select answer_info.paperId as paperid,answer_info.questionId as questionid,question.questionskill as questionskill,question.title as title, question.answer as answer,question.questiontype as questiontype,question.analysis as analysis,question.difficultdegree as difficultdgree, answer_info.questionserialnum as questionserialnum,answer_info.answercontent as answercontent,answer_info.score as score,question_in_part.grade as sumscore, answer_info.correctstate as correctstate,question.options as options
from question inner join answer_info on question.questionid=answer_info.questionid inner join question_in_part on question.questionid=question_in_part.questionid where question_in_part.partid= #{partid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and answer_info.paperId = #{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by answer_info.questionSerialNum asc
mapper.insert: insert into answer_info (paperId, questionId, questionSerialNum, answerContent, score, correctState, spare_1, spare_2, spare_3, spare_4) values (#{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into answer_info
paperId,
questionId,
questionSerialNum,
answerContent,
score,
correctState,
spare_1,
spare_2,
spare_3,
spare_4,
#{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select IFNULL (SUM(score), 0) from answer_info where paperid= #{0} and correctstate=1
mapper.update:
update answer_info
paperId = #{record.paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
questionId = #{record.questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
questionSerialNum = #{record.questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
answerContent = #{record.answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
correctState = #{record.correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_3 = #{record.spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare_4 = #{record.spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update answer_info set paperId = #{record.paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, questionId = #{record.questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, questionSerialNum = #{record.questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answerContent = #{record.answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, correctState = #{record.correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_3 = #{record.spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare_4 = #{record.spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update answer_info
questionSerialNum = #{questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
answerContent = #{answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
correctState = #{correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER},
spare_3 = #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare_4 = #{spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where paperId = #{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and questionId = #{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update answer_info set questionSerialNum = #{questionserialnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, answerContent = #{answercontent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, correctState = #{correctstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, spare_3 = #{spare3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare_4 = #{spare4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where paperId = #{paperid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and questionId = #{questionid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
